duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide counseling services to clients via online therapy platform.
Focus solely on clinical work without the need to acquire clients or handle administrative tasks.
Work with specific populations and presenting concerns.
Utilize state-of-the-art technology for secure and encrypted communication.
Maintain privacy and confidentiality for all client interactions.

education_certification.credential: Fully licensed by a State Board to provide counseling independently (e.g., LCSW, LPC, LMFT, PsyD or similar credentials)
